decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings / document title number(s): RET - 01 (SITE PLAN); RET - 03 (PROPOSED FLOOR PLANS AND ELEVATIONS)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the host property and local area, in accordance with Policies D3, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and Policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013).
| Prior to first occupation, the amenity spaces, hard and soft landscaping and boundary treatments inlcuding the glass balustrade hereby approved, shall be installed and retained thereafter.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupiers of the area and in the interests of the future occupants of the development in accordance with policies with policies 3.5 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013), policy 1.1 (e) of the Adopted Ealing Development (Core) Strategy and policy SI8 of the London Plan (2021).
subdivision_of_building: Front courtyard and ground floor level
description: Alterations to sunken courtyard and installation of glass front balustrade (part-retrospective)
application_type_full: Full planning & demolition in a conservation area
